atk-s0502a19:2_0: Natena hotīti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto vinicchayamahāmatte ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:3_0: Ekadivasañhi bhikkhū sāvatthiyaṁ uttaradvāragāme piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkantā nagaramajjhena vihāraṁ āgacchanti.
atk-s0502a19:3_2: Te sammukhāgataṁ vinicchayasālaṁ pavisitvā vinicchayamahāmatte lañjaṁ gahetvā sāmike asāmike karonte disvā ‘‘aho ime adhammikā,
atk-s0502a19:3_3: mayaṁ pana ‘ime dhammena vinicchayaṁ karontī’ti saññino ahumhā’’ti cintetvā vasse vigate vihāraṁ gantvā satthāraṁ vanditvā ekamantaṁ nisinnā tamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ. Satthā ‘‘na, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a19:3_4: chandādivasikā hutvā sāhasena atthaṁ vinicchinantā dhammaṭṭhā nāma honti,
atk-s0502a19:3_5: aparādhaṁ pana anuvijjitvā aparādhānurūpaṁ asāhasena vinicchayaṁ karontā eva dhammaṭṭhā nāma hontī’’ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:5_0: ‘‘Na tena hoti dhammaṭṭho, yenatthaṁ sāhasā naye;
atk-s0502a19:6_0: Yo ca atthaṁ anatthañca, ubho niccheyya paṇḍito.
atk-s0502a19:10_1: Dhammaṭṭhoti rājā hi attano kātabbe vinicchayadhamme ṭhitopi dhammaṭṭho nāma na hoti. Yenāti yena kāraṇena.
atk-s0502a19:10_3: Sāhasā nayeti chandādīsu patiṭṭhito sāhasena musāvādena viniccheyya.
atk-s0502a19:10_4: Yo hi chande patiṭṭhāya ñātīti vā mittoti vā musā vatvā asāmikameva sāmikaṁ karoti,
atk-s0502a19:10_5: dose patiṭṭhāya attano verīnaṁ musā vatvā sāmikameva asāmikaṁ karoti,
atk-s0502a19:10_6: mohe patiṭṭhāya lañjaṁ gahetvā vinicchayakāle aññavihito viya ito cito ca olokento musā vatvā ‘‘iminā jitaṁ,
atk-s0502a19:10_8: bhaye patiṭṭhāya kassacideva issarajātikassa parājayaṁ pāpuṇantassāpi jayaṁ āropeti,
atk-s0502a19:10_10: Eso dhammaṭṭho nāma na hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:10_12: Ubho niccheyyāti yo pana paṇḍito ubho atthānatthe vinicchinitvā vadati. Asāhasenāti amusāvādena.
atk-s0502a19:10_14: Samenāti aparādhānurūpeneva pare nayati, jayaṁ vā parājayaṁ vā pāpeti.
atk-s0502a19:10_15: Dhammassa guttoti so dhammagutto dhammarakkhito dhammojapaññāya samannāgato medhāvī vinicchayadhamme ṭhitattā dhammaṭṭhoti pavuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:14_0: Na tena paṇḍito hotīti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto chabbaggiye ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:15_0: Te kira vihārepi gāmepi bhattaggaṁ ākulaṁ karontā vicaranti.
atk-s0502a19:15_1: Athekadivase bhikkhū gāme bhattakiccaṁ katvā āgate dahare sāmaṇere ca pucchiṁsu – ‘‘kīdisaṁ, āvuso, bhattagga’’nti? Bhante, mā pucchatha,
atk-s0502a19:15_3: ime paharitvā sīse kacavaraṁ ākiritvā nīharissāmā’’ti vatvā amhe piṭṭhiyaṁ gahetvā kacavaraṁ okirantā bhattaggaṁ ākulaṁ akaṁsūti.
atk-s0502a19:15_4: Bhikkhū satthu santikaṁ gantvā tamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ. Satthā ‘‘nāhaṁ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a19:15_6: kheminaṁ pana averīnaṁ abhayameva paṇḍitoti vadāmī’’ti vatvā imaṁ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a19:17_0: ‘‘Na tena paṇḍito hoti, yāvatā bahu bhāsati;
atk-s0502a19:19_0: Tattha yāvatāti yattakena kāraṇena saṅghamajjhādīsu bahuṁ katheti, tena paṇḍito nāma na hoti .
atk-s0502a19:19_1: Yo pana sayaṁ khemī pañcannaṁ verānaṁ abhāvena averī nibbhayo ,
atk-s0502a19:19_2: yaṁ vā āgamma mahājanassa bhayaṁ na hoti, so paṇḍito nāma hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:23_0: Na tāvatāti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto ekudānattheraṁ nāma khīṇāsavaṁ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:24_0: So kira ekakova ekasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe viharati, ekamevassa udānaṁ paguṇaṁ –
atk-s0502a19:29_0: So kira uposathadivasesu sayameva dhammassavanaṁ ghosetvā imaṁ gāthaṁ vadati.
atk-s0502a19:29_2: Athekasmiṁ uposathadivase pañcapañcasataparivārā dve tipiṭakadharā bhikkhū tassa vasanaṭṭhānaṁ agamaṁsu.
atk-s0502a19:29_3: So te disvāva tuṭṭhamānaso ‘‘sādhu vo kataṁ idha āgacchantehi,
atk-s0502a19:29_4: ajja mayaṁ tumhākaṁ dhammaṁ suṇissāmā’’ti āha. Atthi pana, āvuso, idha dhammaṁ sotukāmāti. Atthi, bhante,
atk-s0502a19:29_5: ayaṁ vanasaṇḍo dhammassavanadivase devatānaṁ sādhukārasaddena ekaninnādo hotīti.
atk-s0502a19:29_6: Tesu eko tipiṭakadharo dhammaṁ osāresi, eko kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:29_7: Ekadevatāpi sādhukāraṁ nādāsi. Te āhaṁsu – ‘‘tvaṁ, āvuso,
atk-s0502a19:29_8: dhammassavanadivase imasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe devatā mahantena saddena sādhukāraṁ dentīti vadesi, kiṁ nāmeta’’nti. Bhante,
atk-s0502a19:29_9: aññesu divasesu sādhukārasaddena ekaninnādo eva hoti,
atk-s0502a19:29_10: na ajja pana jānāmi ‘‘kimeta’’nti. ‘‘Tena hi, āvuso,
atk-s0502a19:29_12: So bījaniṁ gahetvā āsane nisinno tameva gāthaṁ vadesi.
atk-s0502a19:29_14: Atha nesaṁ parivārā bhikkhū ujjhāyiṁsu ‘‘imasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe devatā mukholokanena sādhukāraṁ dadanti,
atk-s0502a19:29_15: tipiṭakadharabhikkhūsu ettakaṁ bhaṇantesupi kiñci pasaṁsanamattampi avatvā ekena mahallakattherena ekagāthāya kathitāya mahāsaddena sādhukāraṁ dadantī’’ti.
atk-s0502a19:29_16: Tepi vihāraṁ gantvā satthu tamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
atk-s0502a19:30_1: yo bahumpi uggaṇhati vā bhāsati vā, taṁ dhammadharoti vadāmi.
atk-s0502a19:30_2: Yo pana ekampi gāthaṁ uggaṇhitvā saccāni paṭivijjhati,
atk-s0502a19:30_3: ayaṁ dhammadharo nāmā’’ti vatvā dhammaṁ desento imaṁ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a19:33_0: Yo ca appampi sutvāna, dhammaṁ kāyena passati;
atk-s0502a19:34_0: Sa ve dhammadharo hoti, yo dhammaṁ nappamajjatī’’ti.
atk-s0502a19:35_0: Tattha yāvatāti yattakena uggahaṇadhāraṇavācanādinā kāraṇena bahuṁ bhāsati,
atk-s0502a19:35_3: Yo ca appampīti yo pana appamattakampi sutvā dhammamanvāya atthamanvāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hutvā nāmakāyena dukkhādīni parijānanto catusaccadhammaṁ passati, sa ve dhammadharo hoti.
atk-s0502a19:35_4: Yo dhammaṁ nappamajjatīti yopi āraddhavīriyo hutvā ajja ajjevāti paṭivedhaṁ ākaṅkhanto dhammaṁ nappamajjati,
atk-s0502a19:39_0: Natena thero so hotīti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto lakuṇḍakabhaddiyattheraṁ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:40_0: Ekadivasañhi tasmiṁ there satthu upaṭṭhānaṁ gantvā pakkantamatte tiṁsamattā āraññikā bhikkhū taṁ passantā eva āgantvā satthāraṁ vanditvā nisīdiṁsu.
atk-s0502a19:40_1: Satthā tesaṁ arahattūpanissayaṁ disvā imaṁ pañhaṁ pucchi – ‘‘ito gataṁ ekaṁ theraṁ passathā’’ti? ‘‘Na passāma, bhante’’ti. ‘‘Kiṁ nu diṭṭho vo’’ti? ‘‘Ekaṁ, bhante, sāmaṇeraṁ passimhā’’ti. ‘‘Na so, bhikkhave, sāmaṇero, thero eva so’’ti? ‘‘Ativiya khuddako, bhante’’ti. ‘‘Nāhaṁ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a19:40_3: Yo pana saccāni paṭivijjhitvā mahājanassa ahiṁsakabhāve ṭhito,
atk-s0502a19:40_4: ayaṁ thero nāmā’’ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:42_0: ‘‘Na tena thero so hoti, yenassa palitaṁ siro;
atk-s0502a19:45_0: ‘‘Yamhi saccañca dhammo ca, ahiṁsā saṁyamo damo;
atk-s0502a19:46_0: Sa ve vantamalo dhīro, thero iti pavuccatī’’ti.
atk-s0502a19:47_0: Tattha paripakkoti pariṇato, vuḍḍhabhāvaṁ pattoti attho.
atk-s0502a19:47_1: Moghajiṇṇoti anto therakarānaṁ dhammānaṁ abhāvena tucchajiṇṇo nāma.
atk-s0502a19:47_2: Yamhi saccañca dhammo cāti yamhi pana puggale soḷasahākārehi paṭividdhattā catubbidhaṁ saccaṁ,
atk-s0502a19:47_3: ñāṇena sacchikatattā navavidho lokuttaradhammo ca atthi. Ahiṁsāti ahiṁsanabhāvo. Desanāmattametaṁ,
atk-s0502a19:47_4: yamhi pana catubbidhāpi appamaññābhāvanā atthīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:47_7: Theroti so imehi thirabhāvakārakehi samannāgatattā theroti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:51_0: Navākkaraṇamattenāti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:52_0: Ekasmiñhi samaye dahare ceva sāmaṇere ca attano dhammācariyānameva cīvararajanādīni veyyāvaccāni karonte disvā ekacce therā cintayiṁsu – ‘‘mayampi byañjanasamaye kusalā, amhākameva kiñci natthi.
atk-s0502a19:52_1: Yaṁnūna mayaṁ satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadeyyāma, ‘bhante, mayaṁ byañjanasamaye kusalā,
atk-s0502a19:52_2: aññesaṁ santike dhammaṁ uggaṇhitvāpi imesaṁ santike asodhetvā mā sajjhāyitthāti daharasāmaṇere āṇāpethā’ti.
atk-s0502a19:53_0: Satthā tesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā ‘‘imasmiṁ sāsane paveṇivaseneva evaṁ vattuṁ labhati,
atk-s0502a19:53_1: ime pana lābhasakkāre nissitāti ñatvā ahaṁ tumhe vākkaraṇamattena sādhurūpāti na vadāmi.
atk-s0502a19:53_2: Yassa panete issādayo dhammā arahattamaggena samucchinnā,
atk-s0502a19:53_3: eso eva sādhurūpo’’ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:56_0: Sādhurūpo naro hoti, issukī maccharī saṭho.
atk-s0502a19:60_2: Naroti ettakeneva kāraṇena paralābhādīsu issāmanako pañcavidhena maccherena samannāgato kerāṭikabhāvena saṭho naro sādhurūpo na hoti.
atk-s0502a19:60_3: Yassa cetanti yassa ca puggalassetaṁ issādidosajātaṁ arahattamaggañāṇena samūlakaṁ chinnaṁ, mūlaghātaṁ katvā samūhataṁ ,
atk-s0502a19:60_4: so vantadoso dhammojapaññāya samannāgato sādhurūpoti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:64_0: Namuṇḍakena samaṇoti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā sāvatthiyaṁ viharanto hatthakaṁ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:65_0: So kira vādakkhitto ‘‘tumhe asukavelāya asukaṭṭhānaṁ nāma āgaccheyyātha,
atk-s0502a19:65_1: vādaṁ karissāmā’’ti vatvā puretarameva tattha gantvā ‘‘passatha,
atk-s0502a19:65_3: esova pana nesaṁ parājayo’’tiādīni vatvā vādakkhitto aññenaññaṁ paṭicaranto vicarati.
atk-s0502a19:65_4: Satthā ‘‘hatthako kira evaṁ karotī’’ti sutvā taṁ pakkosāpetvā ‘‘saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, hatthaka,
atk-s0502a19:65_5: evaṁ karosī’’ti pucchitvā ‘‘sacca’’nti vutte, ‘‘kasmā evaṁ karosi?
atk-s0502a19:65_6: Evarūpañhi musāvādaṁ karonto sīsamuṇḍanādimatteneva samaṇo nāma na hoti.
atk-s0502a19:65_7: Yo pana aṇūni vā thūlāni vā pāpāni sametvā ṭhito,
atk-s0502a19:65_8: ayameva samaṇo’’ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:70_0: ‘‘Yo ca sameti pāpāni, aṇuṁ thūlāni sabbaso;
atk-s0502a19:72_1: Abbatoti sīlavatena ca dhutaṅgavatena ca virahito.
atk-s0502a19:72_2: Alikaṁ bhaṇanti musāvādaṁ bhaṇanto asampattesu ārammaṇesu icchāya pattesu ca lobhena samannāgato samaṇo nāma kiṁ bhavissati?
atk-s0502a19:72_3: Sametīti yo ca parittāni vā mahantāni vā pāpāni vūpasameti,
atk-s0502a19:72_4: so tesaṁ samitattā samaṇoti pavuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:76_0: Natena bhikkhu so hotīti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto aññataraṁ brāhmaṇaṁ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:77_0: So kira bāhirasamaye pabbajitvā bhikkhaṁ caranto cintesi – ‘‘samaṇo gotamo attano sāvake bhikkhāya caraṇena ‘bhikkhū’ti vadati,
atk-s0502a19:77_1: mampi ‘bhikkhū’ti vattuṁ vaṭṭatī’’ti. So satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā, ‘‘bho gotama,
atk-s0502a19:77_3: mampi ‘bhikkhū’ti vadehī’’ti āha. Atha naṁ satthā ‘‘nāhaṁ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0502a19:77_5: Na hi vissaṁ dhammaṁ samādāya vattanto bhikkhu nāma hoti.
atk-s0502a19:77_7: so bhikkhu nāmā’’ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:79_0: ‘‘Na tena bhikkhu so hoti, yāvatā bhikkhate pare;
atk-s0502a19:80_0: Vissaṁ dhammaṁ samādāya, bhikkhu hoti na tāvatā.
atk-s0502a19:83_0: Saṅkhāya loke carati, sa ve bhikkhūti vuccatī’’ti.
atk-s0502a19:84_1: tena bhikkhanamattena bhikkhu nāma na hoti. Vissanti visamaṁ dhammaṁ,
atk-s0502a19:84_2: vissagandhaṁ vā kāyakammādikaṁ dhammaṁ samādāya caranto bhikkhu nāma na hoti.
atk-s0502a19:84_3: Yodhāti yo idha sāsane ubhayampetaṁ puññañca pāpañca maggabrahmacariyena bāhetvā panuditvā brahmacariyavā hoti. Saṅkhāyāti ñāṇena.
atk-s0502a19:84_5: ime bāhirā’’ti evaṁ sabbepi dhamme jānitvā carati,
atk-s0502a19:84_6: so tena ñāṇena kilesānaṁ bhinnattā ‘‘bhikkhū’’ti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:88_0: Namonenāti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto titthiye ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:89_0: Te kira bhuttaṭṭhānesu manussānaṁ ‘‘khemaṁ hotu, sukhaṁ hotu, āyu vaḍḍhatu,
atk-s0502a19:89_3: evarūpaṁ ṭhānaṁ gantuṁ na vaṭṭatī’’tiādinā nayena maṅgalaṁ vatvā pakkamanti.
atk-s0502a19:89_4: Bhikkhū pana paṭhamabodhiyaṁ anumodanādīnaṁ ananuññātakāle bhattagge manussānaṁ anumodanaṁ akatvā pakkamanti.
atk-s0502a19:89_8: ito paṭṭhāya bhattaggādīsu yathāsukhaṁ anumodanaṁ karotha, upanisinnakathaṁ karotha, dhammaṁ kathethā’’ti anujāni. Te tathā kariṁsu.
atk-s0502a19:89_9: Manussā anumodanādīni suṇantā ussāhappattā bhikkhū nimantetvā sakkāraṁ karontā vicaranti.
atk-s0502a19:89_11: samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakā bhattaggādīsu mahākathaṁ kathentā vicarantī’’ti ujjhāyiṁsu.
atk-s0502a19:90_2: Ekacce hi ajānantā na kathenti, ekacce avisāradatāya,
atk-s0502a19:90_3: ekacce ‘mā no imaṁ atisayatthaṁ aññe jāniṁsū’ti maccherena.
atk-s0502a19:90_5: pāpavūpasamena pana muni nāma hotī’’ti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:93_0: Yo ca tulaṁva paggayha, varamādāya paṇḍito.
atk-s0502a19:95_0: ‘‘Pāpāni parivajjeti, sa munī tena so muni;
atk-s0502a19:96_0: Yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī’’ti.
atk-s0502a19:97_0: Tattha na monenāti kāmañhi moneyyapaṭipadāsaṅkhātena maggañāṇamonena muni nāma hoti,
atk-s0502a19:97_1: idha pana tuṇhībhāvaṁ sandhāya ‘‘monenā’’ti vuttaṁ. Mūḷharūpoti tuccharūpo. Aviddasūti aviññū.
atk-s0502a19:97_2: Evarūpo hi tuṇhībhūtopi muni nāma na hoti.
atk-s0502a19:97_3: Atha vā monena muni nāma na hoti,
atk-s0502a19:97_4: tucchasabhāvo pana aviññū ca hotīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:97_5: Yo ca tulaṁva pagayhāti yathā hi tulaṁ gahetvā ṭhito atirekaṁ ce hoti, harati. Ūnaṁ ce hoti , pakkhipati.
atk-s0502a19:97_6: Evameva yo atirekaṁ haranto viya pāpaṁ harati parivajjeti,
atk-s0502a19:97_8: Evañca pana karonto sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttivimuttiñāṇadassanasaṅkhātaṁ varaṁ uttamameva ādāya pāpāni akusalakammāni parivajjeti.
atk-s0502a19:97_9: Sa munīti so muni nāmāti attho.
atk-s0502a19:97_10: Tena so munīti kasmā pana so munīti ce? Yaṁ heṭṭhā vuttakāraṇaṁ, tena so munīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:97_11: So munāti ubho loketi yo puggalo imasmiṁ khandhādiloke tulaṁ āropetvā minanto viya ‘‘ime ajjhattikā khandhā,
atk-s0502a19:97_12: ime bāhirā’’tiādinā nayena ime ubho atthe munāti.
atk-s0502a19:97_13: Muni tena pavuccatīti tena kāraṇena munīti vuccatiyevāti attho.
atk-s0502a19:101_0: Na tena ariyo hotīti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṁ ariyaṁ nāma bālisikaṁ ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:102_0: Ekadivasañhi satthā tassa sotāpattimaggassūpanissayaṁ disvā sāvatthiyā uttaradvāragāme piṇḍāya caritvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto tato āgacchati.
atk-s0502a19:102_1: Tasmiṁ khaṇe so bālisiko balisena macche gaṇhanto buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ disvā balisayaṭṭhiṁ chaḍḍetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0502a19:102_2: Satthā tassa avidūre ṭhāne nivattitvā ṭhito ‘‘tvaṁ kiṁ nāmosī’’ti sāriputtattherādīnaṁ nāmāni pucchi.
atk-s0502a19:102_3: Tepi ‘‘ahaṁ sāriputto ahaṁ moggallāno’’ti attano attano nāmāni kathayiṁsu.
atk-s0502a19:102_5: mamampi nāmaṁ pucchissati maññe’’ti. Satthā tassa icchaṁ ñatvā, ‘‘upāsaka,
atk-s0502a19:102_6: tvaṁ ko nāmosī’’ti pucchitvā ‘‘ahaṁ, bhante, ariyo nāmā’’ti vutte ‘‘na, upāsaka,
atk-s0502a19:102_8: ariyā pana mahājanassa ahiṁsanabhāve ṭhitā’’ti vatvā imaṁ gāthamāha –
atk-s0502a19:104_0: ‘‘Na tena ariyo hoti, yena pāṇāni hiṁsati;
atk-s0502a19:106_1: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – yena hi pāṇāni hiṁsati, na tena kāraṇena ariyo hoti.
atk-s0502a19:106_2: Yo pana sabbapāṇānaṁ pāṇiādīhi ahiṁsanena mettādibhāvanāya patiṭṭhitattā hiṁsato ārāva ṭhito, ayaṁ ariyoti vuccatīti attho.
atk-s0502a19:110_0: Na sīlabbatamattenāti imaṁ dhammadesanaṁ satthā jetavane viharanto sambahule sīlādisampanne bhikkhū ārabbha kathesi.
atk-s0502a19:111_0: Tesu kira ekaccānaṁ evaṁ ahosi – ‘‘mayaṁ sampannasīlā, mayaṁ dhutaṅgadharā, mayaṁ bahussutā, mayaṁ pantasenāsanavāsino, mayaṁ jhānalābhino,
atk-s0502a19:111_2: icchitadivaseyeva arahattaṁ pāpuṇissāmā’’ti. Yepi tattha anāgāmino,
atk-s0502a19:111_3: tesampi etadahosi – ‘‘na amhākaṁ idāni arahattaṁ dullabha’’nti.
atk-s0502a19:111_4: Te sabbepi ekadivasaṁ satthāraṁ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā nisinnā ‘‘api nu kho vo, bhikkhave,
atk-s0502a19:111_5: pabbajitakiccaṁ matthakaṁ patta’’nti satthārā puṭṭhā evamāhaṁsu – ‘‘bhante, mayaṁ evarūpā evarūpā ca,
atk-s0502a19:111_6: tasmā ‘icchiticchitakkhaṇeyeva arahattaṁ pattuṁ samatthamhā’ti cintetvā viharāmā’’ti.
atk-s0502a19:112_1: bhikkhunā nāma parisuddhasīlādimattakena vā anāgāmisukhappattamattakena vā ‘appakaṁ no bhavadukkha’nti vattuṁ na vaṭṭati,
atk-s0502a19:112_2: āsavakkhayaṁ pana appatvā ‘sukhitomhī’ti cittaṁ na uppādetabba’’nti vatvā imā gāthā abhāsi –
atk-s0502a19:119_0: Tattha sīlabbatamattenāti catupārisuddhisīlamattena vā terasadhutaṅgamattena vā.
atk-s0502a19:119_1: Bāhusaccena vāti tiṇṇaṁ piṭakānaṁ uggahitamattena vā.
atk-s0502a19:119_8: Idaṁ vuttaṁ hoti – bhikkhu iminā sampannasīlādibhāvamattakeneva ‘‘mayhaṁ bhavo appako parittako’’ti āsavakkhayasaṅkhātaṁ arahattaṁ appatto hutvā bhikkhu nāma vissāsaṁ nāpajjeyya.
atk-s0502a19:119_9: Yathā hi appamattakopi gūtho duggandho hoti,
